body:
I encountered loads of issues trying to install openmpi with PGI. This might help.
I considered adding openmpi%pgi in packages.yaml and provide its path in pgi prefix. Though I'm still looking for a way to make it generic and not hardcoded, use something like `spec.pgi.prefix` but I'm not sure if it's a valid syntax.
title: Add PGI version 19.7 and export OMPI variables
